channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 08:45 The threat of artillery shelling in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community has been eliminated. Follow further reports.
item.description: 🟢 08:45 The threat of artillery shelling in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community has been eliminated. Follow further reports. #city_of_Nikopol_and_the_Nikopol_territorial_community This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟢 08:26 Threat of artillery shelling in Chervonohryhorivska territorial community repulsed. Stay tuned for further reports.
item.description: 🟢 08:26 Threat of artillery shelling in Chervonohryhorivska territorial community repulsed. Stay tuned for further reports. #Chervonohryhorivska_territorial_community This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🔴 08:01 Threat of artillery shelling! Now in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community there is artillery shelling. Go to shelter!
item.description: 🔴 08:01 Threat of artillery shelling! Now in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community there is artillery shelling. Go to shelter! #city_of_Nikopol_and_the_Nikopol_territorial_community This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
